title: Twitter will lose bird logo in latest brand overhaul, Elon Musk says
description: Elon Musk suggested replacing Twitter’s blue bird with an ‘X’ and changing its default color to black or white.

title: The creator economy was already exploding. Then Hollywood went on strike.
description: The last big strikes reshaped the movie business and fueled the rise of reality TV. The latest walkout likely will help turn established actors into TikTok stars — and vice versa.
